titles.title: A bill to include Hepatitis A vaccines in the Vaccine Injury Compensation Program under title XXI of the Public Health Service Act.
A bill to include Hepatitis A vaccines in the Vaccine Injury Compensation Program under title XXI of the Public Health Service Act.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to include any vaccine against hepatitis A under the 75-cents-per-dose manufacturer's excise tax.
